about_the_game:
This Claws and Paws Pack includes 35 pet Clothing Items, 13 pet Furniture Items, 1 pet Mount, and 1 Pet.

Meow! The Claws and Paws Pack is full of 50 feline and canine-themed items that are sure to make any farm a pet lover’s dream.

Pack includes:
  • Pet Furniture Set: Pet Chair, Pet Table, Pet Couch, Pet Wardrobe, Pet End Table, Pet Bed, Dog Biscuit Rug, Dog Treat Rug, Mailbox Lamp, Bird House Lamp, Empty Pet Dish, Full Pet Dish, and Cat Scratcher
  • Blue Puppy Outfit Set: Blue Puppy Beanie, Blue Puppy Hood, Blue Puppy Sweater Dress, Blue Puppy Shirt, Blue Puppy Pants, Blue Puppy Mittens, and Blue Puppy Boots
  • Pink Kitty Outfit Set: Pink Kitty Beanie, Pink Kitty Hood, Pink Kitty Sweater Dress, Pink Kitty Shirt, Pink Kitty Pants, Pink Kitty Mittens, and Pink Kitty Boots
  • Cat Mascot Outfit Set: Cat Mascot Head and Cat Mascot Robe
  • Dog Mascot Outfit Set: Dog Mascot Head and Dog Mascot Robe
  • Puppy Outfit Set: Puppy Ear Headband, Puppy Bandana, Puppy Gloves, and Puppy Paw Pants
  • Kitty Outfit Set: Kitty Ear Headband, Kitty Bandana, Kitty Gloves, and Kitty Paw Skirt
  • Toy Cat Outfit Set: Toy Cat Mask and Toy Cat Dress
  • Toy Dog Outfit Set: Toy Dog Mask, Toy Dog Vest, and Toy Dog Shorts
  • Pet Lover Outfit Set: Sleepy Puppy Hat, Sleepy Kitty Hat, Fluffy Pet Lover Coat, and Fluffy Pet Lover Pants
  • Plush Kitty Mount
  • Fido, the Plush Puppy Pet
